translations: adj．令人惊讶的，令人吃惊的：使人感到惊讶或震惊的事物或情况。
这个消息简直令人震惊。

sentences.sentence: From my perch, I have watched the flabbergasting events of the past week.
sentences.translation: 从我所处的高度，我观看了过去一周那些令人目瞪口呆的事件。

sentences.sentence: Knowing which way you lean can save you so much time and energy, it's flabbergasting.
sentences.translation: 了解你所倾向的方式有助于节省时间和精力。这令人非常吃惊！

sentences.sentence: Welcome to the chaotic and flabbergasting magical world of Lennart Green, grand master of close-up card trickery.
sentences.translation: 欢迎来到Lennart Green混乱而绚丽的魔术世界，观看大师级的近景卡片魔术。
